result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Tyler Miquel Spears

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Tyler Miquel Spears appeared by video.  Attorney Michael G. Levine appeared by video for Tyler Miquel Spears.  Attorney Katherine Seelow in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Scheduling conference held. Defense requests Final Pretrial and Jury Trial dates. Any witness lists, special jury instructions, and motion in limine to be filed 48 hours before the final pretrial date. Court orders case adjourned for final pretrial and jury trial in Branch 29.
Final pre-trial scheduled for December 1, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Jury trial scheduled for January 3, 2023 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Tyler Miquel Spears appeared by video.  Attorney Michael Moran for Michael G. Levine appeared by video for Tyler Miquel Spears. Student Intern Bailey Groh Rasmussen under the supervision of Attorney Katherine Seelow in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Scheduling conference held. For reasons stated on the record, parties request an additional scheduling conference. Case is adjourned to Br. 29.

Defendant Tyler Miquel Spears in court with attorney Michael G. Levine.  Katherine Seelow appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for Preliminary Hearing. Amended Information filed.  Copy given to defense counsel who waived reading.  Defendant pled not guilty. Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing. Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed.  Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial. *Defense acknowledges receipt of the Information, waives reading and enters a plea of not guilty on behalf of his client. Case adjourned for a scheduling conference date to Br 29.  Scheduling conference scheduled for September 8, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Tyler Miquel Spears in court with attorney Michael G. Levine.  Katherine Seelow appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for Bail Bond Hearing. All parties appeared via zoom. Arguments heard as to bail conditions. Court orders the no contact order be followed exactly as written on the CPAU order signed and dated 07/11/2022. Defendant waived time limits for Preliminary Hearing. Court finds CAUSE to adjourn preliminary hearing. Case adjourned to Br 29.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 11, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

Court ordered the remaining cash bail to be returned to the remitter.
Court ordered no possession or use of any dangerous weapons or firearms.

Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with T.M.S. (dob 4/23/2020).
No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
Court advised Defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Tyler Miquel Spears in court with attorney Michael G. Levine.  Elaine B. Fehrs appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Kiefer, Branch 29.
Defendant given a copy of complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT DOES NOT QUALIFY FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for July 15, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Tyler Miquel Spears
Current: 2634 N 59th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53210   (Effective: 07-11-2022)
Prior: 2552 North 12th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53206
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 7/11/22 @ 1p
Defendant is Out-of-Custody. Court appearance in Out-Of-Custody Court, Room 221 Safety Building on 07/11/2022@1pm
